pages.text: Compared to the $(item)Bow$(), the $(item)Crossbow$() maintains a rather inconspicuous existence.$(br2)With the Sniping Enchantment however, the crossbow becomes a deadly ranged weapon.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Increases damage, accuracy and projectile speed.$(br2)Max Level: 2$(br)Applicable to Crossbows.$(br)Mutually exclusive with Multishot.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a $(item)common Book$() with Sniping by surrounding your $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and the other required materials.
